name: Tenter USD.T
description: Tenter USD.T is a digital currency built on the BNB Smart Chain. It aims to provide stabilityby maintaining a 1:1 peg with the US dollar, similar to other stablecoins, Tenter (USD.T) is a stablecoin designed to maintain a stable value at parity with the US dollar (USD) through the utilization of advanced algorithms and mechanisms. This whitepaper outlines the key features, design principles, and mechanisms that underpin the Tenter USD.T stablecoin.
